text: as in contacts who have ever viewed a page? I'd use a filter for last page view is known

Hi,

Has anyone come up with a solution to auto assign tasks based on criteria such as:
1. select on those users who have less than x open tasks already
2. and task assignment date or due date (yet to decide) is on a rostered day i.e. when person is working/available 
I am hoping I have just missed a native solution to do this but otherwise I keep coming back to custom code.
